abstract: Bank of America has sued financial adviser Kenneth Starr, who pleaded guilty to fraud last month, over a $500,000 loan, Reuters reported.
snippet: Bank of America has sued financial adviser Kenneth Starr, who pleaded guilty to fraud last month, over a $500,000 loan, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has sued the financial adviser Kenneth Starr, who pleaded guilty to fraud last month, over a $500,000 loan, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Bank of America Sues Adviser Starr

abstract: The Weinstein Company is launching a new financing arm, Deadline Hollywood reports.
snippet: The Weinstein Company is launching a new financing arm, Deadline Hollywood reports.
lead_paragraph: The Weinstein Company is planning to start a new financing arm, Deadline Hollywood reports.

headline.main: Weinstein Co. Is Said to Plan Funding Arm
